name: Pie Hard (Zlaktarn)
description:
Pie Hard
Is racing game I made for a school assignment. Had myself a great time while working on this. The game goes fast, is intense and the controls are scripted from scratch turned out pretty well. 

The menu and instructions looks awesomely awful and had great fun with creating those assets during that time. 

I hope you enjoy this little demo!

Don't own the rights to these songs:
Alice Francis - Gangsterlove Shiny Mob Remix (Electro Swing)
Jean & Dean - Little Old Lady From Pasadena
